participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Caring and determined, Emma is focused on her studies and enjoys spending time with friends.
participant_1.background: i don't like chicken. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, Liam finds comfort in his hobbies and values community connections.
participant_2.background: i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. i've a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

content.text: And II got to say, as someone who likes to order the occasional meal from a joint like that,
